content: Since I mentioned him in this thread I would like to do an appreciation for Erik Palmgren and the fact that he was writing papers informally using intensional type theory a couple of decades before the HoTT book. He may end up being seen as truly ahead of the time...
Indeed. People are going back through his work and finding real gems of powerful mathematics done with very few commitments in the meta-theory - both intensional and predicative.
Any favorite papers you'd like to recommend? I'd be happy read more stuff that reasons informally in type theory.
